Have for sale a 1898-1899 Lou Criger National Copper Plate.  Asking $250 dlvd in US. Please see scan below. Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
